channel.title: Need help with few things

item.title: Need help with few things

item.description:
@Magic_Shroom wrote:

im sory its been and im getting back into it… how would i find it? A lot of my shit is inCombat() dunno if thats it? when i use that i get

'(' expected if incombat() ^ ')' expected if incombat() ^

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with few things
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

[quote=“Magic Shroom, post:6, topic:287505”] im getting an error with

case 9154: // Log out if (inCombat) sendMessage("You must wait 10 seconds after combat to log out!"); else logout(); savefile = true; break;

Error says cannot find symbol variable incombat ^[/quote]
Then replace it with the method that indicates whether a player is in combat.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with few things
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

case 9154: // Log out if (inCombat) sendMessage("You must wait 10 seconds after combat to log out!"); else logout(); break;

Add ‘savefile = true;’ to the logout() method.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with few things
item.dc:creator: @Magic_Shroom Magic Shroom
item.description:
@Magic_Shroom wrote:

thanks guys, Tm i got an error with yours and ill let you know about yours in a a second rich.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 07, 2009, 03:36:37 pm[/size][hr]no luck with yours either rich im using allstars base btw.

item.title: Need help with few things
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

Example;

public long[] playerDelay = new long[5];

case 9154: if (System.currentTimeMillis() - p.playerDelay[0] < 10000) { p.frames.sendMsg("You have to wait 10 seconds out of being in combat to logout."); return; } p.disconnectPlayer = true; break;

and, when the player takes damage;

playerDelay[0] = System.currentTimeMillis();

You can figure it out.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with few things
item.description:
@11167 wrote:

case 9154: // Log out { if (inCombat()) sendMessage("You're in combat."); if (LogoutDelay >= 1) { sendMessage("You must wait 10 seconds after combat to log out!"); } else if (!inCombat() && LogoutDelay == 0) { logout(); savefile = true; } } break;

Check for inCombat(), as I have added.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with few things
item.dc:creator: @Magic_Shroom Magic Shroom
item.description:
@Magic_Shroom wrote:

Ok I have a few problems. First one how do i make it so players can’t log out during combat? heres my code doesnt seem to work…

case 9154: // Log out { if (LogoutDelay >= 1) { sendMessage("You must wait 10 seconds after combat to log out!"); } else if (LogoutDelay == 0) { logout(); savefile = true; } } break;

Second one is how do I make it so you follow when you pk

Third how do I make it so with range or mage you don’t have to be right next to them to use it?

thanks (sorry lots of questions

Read full topic
